text: Haltern am See (Haltern at the lake, before December 2001 only Haltern) is a town and a municipality in the district of Recklinghausen, in North Rhine- Westphalia, Germany. It is next to the Lippe River and the Wesel-Datteln Canal, approx. 15 km north of Recklinghausen. == Twin towns == * Rochford, Essex, England * Roost-Warendin, France * Sankt Veit an der Glan, Austria == References == == Other websites == * Livius.org: Roman fortress Haltern Category:Cities in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Recklinghausen (district)
title: Haltern am See
